meta_description: Norman Rockwell Museum presents the world’s largest collection of original Norman Rockwell art as the best of American illustration.
hours_text:
Visit[Rich Bradway](https://www.nrm.org/author/richbradway/ "Posts by Rich Bradway")2026-01-13T16:11:36-05:00

[Due to inclement weather, Norman Rockwell Museum   
will close at 2pm today, Saturday January 17 2026. ](https://www.nrm.org/2021/11/norman-rockwell-sep/)

# VISIT

  * Museum Visit
  * Museum Visit + Gallery Tour
  * Rockwell's Studio Tour

  * Museum Visit

******A warm welcome awaits you at the home for American illustration inspired by Norman Rockwell’s legacy!** Marvel at Rockwell’s full-size original paintings, view all 323 of his The Saturday Evening Post covers, and be enchanted by special exhibitions that highlight the artistry of leading illustrators, then and now. There’s always something new to discover: **10 galleries, engaging programs, and a scenic 36-acre campus.**

**Reserve online to secure your tickets, as availability is limited.**

**Rockwell’s Studio is closed for the season.**

_**Please note: Museum admission is required with all guided Studio and gallery tour tickets.**_

[Buy Admission](https://tickets.nrm.org/orders/538/calendar?eventId=6387e7568b22f34931d3e160&cart)

  * Museum Visit + Gallery Tour

**Rockwell’s Life & Art Gallery Tours (40 minutes) – **Reserve an engaging and inspiring guided tour to enhance your Museum Visit. Leave with a new understanding of Rockwell’s original oil paintings, from the intricate details of his artistry to the social impact of his storytelling, and learn about his early influences, training, and the arc ...
